prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with rugged features and an imposing stance.
Imagine a ground-type creature that resembles a giant prehistoric beast.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience with a rocky exterior.
Design a Pokemon that has a heavy armored look and is known for its defense.

Make a Pokemon that is powerful and intimidating, ideal for battle scenarios.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains and has massive arms.
